about.title: Sobre mi
about.description1: Full-stack developer with a 10-year track record in programming and 5 years of work experience. Specialized in mobile and web application development, with expert command of PHP (Laravel), Node.js, JavaScript, React, React Native, and Flutter. Extensive experience with MySQL databases. I have provided robust and efficient solutions in backend (PHP/Laravel) and frontend (React, Blade, Flutter) roles for various companies.
about.description2: Soy un apasionado [Tu Profesión/Interés] con experiencia en [Tus Experiencias]. Me encanta crear [Lo Que Te Gusta Crear] y siempre estoy buscando aprender nuevas cosas.
